title: ciupidos
author: ciupidos
content: Satoshi Club is a web3 marketing and consultancy agency that connects blockchain companies with crypto native communities.We always look to hire talented people motivated to make a living in the crypto industry. If you are a crypto enthusiasts and you understand such notions as blockchain, cryptocurrency, descentrilzed finance or NFTs – you want to work for us.We need specific sets of skills: coding, copywriting, marketing, community management, content creation, social media mananagement, research & analytics, video editing, graphic design.If you think you have what it takes to make a career for the long term in the crypto space, please file this form! Telegram    Twitter
